snippet: Faster Internet speeds are becoming a necessity, and governments are trying to push for improvements.
abstract: Editorial welcomes programs in states like Connecticut and Tennessee that aim to increase access to broadband Internet service; endorses plan in New York State to use public funds to entice private sector to widen access; argues government intervention is appropriate because Internet service has become a utility that is essential to modern life.
lead_paragraph: Faster Internet speeds are becoming a necessity, and governments are trying to push for improvements.

headline.print_headline: Look to the States on Broadband
headline.main: Look to the States on Broadband
